DOC.brief_summary: During laparoscopic surgery , muscle relaxant often administrate order ensure acceptable surgical condition . These drug bind receptor neuromuscular junction . The degree muscle relaxation monitor use acceleromyography end surgery another drug - Neostigmine- give reverse muscle relaxation . However , may still blockade 70 % receptor . This partial muscle relaxation may result muscle weakness , reduce balance prolong hospitalization . This study describe change balance subjective muscle weakness laparoscopic surgery . The primary hypothesis sway area increase 30 min extubation compare preoperative value .
